idea-plugin.name: ZeitBuilder
idea-plugin.description:
ZeitBuilder - Automatic Builder pattern generator for Java classes.

Key Features:

  • Automatic generation: Creates an inner Builder class with fluent methods
  • Two builder styles:
    • Traditional builder (copies values at the end)
    • Instance-based builder (directly modifies the object)
  • Field selection: Choose which fields to include in the builder
  • Generated methods:
    • builder() - Static method to create the builder
    • but() - Method to create a modifiable copy
    • build() - Builds the final instance
  • IDE integration: Available in the Generate menu (Alt+Insert)
  • Persistent configuration: Remembers your builder style preference

Usage:

  1. Place the cursor inside a Java class
  2. Press Alt+Insert or go to Code → Generate
  3. Select "Builder"
  4. Choose the fields and builder style

Compatible with IntelliJ IDEA 2024.2+

action.description: Genera el patrón Builder para la clase seleccionada
